definition[0]: if you are passed over for a job, someone else who is younger or lower in the organization than you is chosen for it
example[0]: This is the second time I’ve been passed over for promotion (=someone else has been given a higher job instead of me).
explanation[0]: Pass over is usually passive in this meaning
definition[1]: if you pass over a remark or subject, you do not spend any time discussing it
example[1]: I want to pass over this quite quickly.
example[2]: I think we’d better pass over that last remark.
